IRRsim 1.0.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

IRRguidelines

Guidelines for interpreting inter-rater reliability statistics.

IRRsim-package

Simulate Inter-Rater Reliability Statistics

IRRsimData

Simulated data used to create tables of expected IRR metrics

IRRsim_demo()

Run the Inter-Rater Reliability shiny app.

agreement()

Calculate percent agreement.

as.data.frame(<IRRsim>)

Converts the results of simulateICC to a data.frame

kappam.fleiss2()

Fleiss' Kappa for m raters

plot(<IRRsim>)

Plot the results of an IRR simulation.

print(<IRRsim>)

Prints the results from simulateICC.

print(<IRRsimSummary>)

Print the result of summary.IRRsim

simulateICC()

Calculates intraclass correlations (ICC) for simulated samples of raters and evaluations.

simulateRatingMatrix()

Simulate a rating matrix.

simulateRatingMatrix2()

Simulate a rating matrix with two ratings per event.

summary(<IRRsim>)

Returns a summary of a IRR simulation.
